samples.ui
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  samples.ui.Component
      samples.ui.Button

public class Button
extends Component

This class implements a user interface button class. An Event of type Event.ITEM_SELECTED is propagated for handled key press events, and an Event of type Event.ITEM_DESELECTED is propagated for handled key release events.

setStateData

public void setStateData(javax.microedition.lcdui.Image[] imgList,
                         int[] colorList)
Set the image and color data for this instance. The button can be in 1 or 3 different states: ON, OFF, or PRESSED. The images and colors at index 0 are used for the ON state, at index 1 are used for the OFF state, abd at index 2 are used for the PRESSED state.

Parameters:
imgList - The array of 3 images.
colorList - The array of 3 colors.

keyPressed

public boolean keyPressed(int action,
                          int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key press action.

Overrides:
keyPressed in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The Button class handles actions of type Canvas.FIRE and notifies registered event listeners of an Event of type Event.ITEM_SELECTED.
key - The key pressed.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.

public boolean keyReleased(int action,
                           int key)
Update the state of this instance in light of a key release action.

Overrides:
keyReleased in class Component
Parameters:
action - The type of action. The Button class handles actions of type Canvas.FIRE and notifies registered event listeners of an Event of type Event.ITEM_DESELECTED.
key - The key released.
Returns:
true if the instance handled the event, and false if the instance ignored the event.
